concept.title: WebHelp Developer References
concept.shortdesc: The chapter is designed to provide more advanced information about the . The audience are developers that want to extend or customize its output and need information about the plugin architecture.

conbody.p: The WebHelp Responsive plugin is a plugin that allows you to transform a DITA based documentation to HTML format. It extends the DITA to XHTML plugin by using its XSLT stylesheets and ANT targets.
WebHelp Responsive output can be generated by using the webhelp-responsive transformation type in your DITA to WebHelp script.
